Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The Federal Budget announcement has left people on welfare excited as they are poised to receive more money. The government is giving single-parent families more subsidy which will now extend to those with older children. The Medicare system overhaul has attracted over $2 billion in funding targeting new GPs and expanding telehealth options. Federal Parliament's budget has attracted much attention with increasing focus on single-parent families welfare subsidies and other social assistance benefits. PM Albanese has approved the welfare boost which will help many Aussies get back on their feet.
